chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: We have a we recommend going through to ensure your environment meets the requirements of the Cloud model you choose.

Once you have an idea of the configuration you want to choose for your cloud and you have gone through the pre-installation steps, you have two options for installation. You can use a GUI that runs in your web browser or you can install via the command-line that exposes the full power and flexibility of &kw-hos-phrase;.
You should use the GUI if:

listitem.para: You are not planning to deploy availability zones or use L3 segmentation in your initial deployment.
You are happy with the tuned &vendor; default OpenStack configuration.

chapter.para: Instructions for installing via the GUI are here.
Note that reconfiguration of your cloud, at the moment, can only be done via the command-line. The GUI installer is for initial installation only.
